explanation: [0-0] On the lawn in front of a castle, a little girl wearing a three-piece uniform stands, with a red and yellow striped tie around her neck, looking to the right.

[0-5] The camera zooms in, and the little girl raises a magic wand with her right hand. The scene switches to a blond man standing on the grass, wearing a uniform similar to Hogwarts school uniform. He takes a magic wand out from the inside of his uniform with his right hand, waves it in a circle, and points it to the right.
